statements: SELECT * FROM employee_time_records WHERE employee_id = 1;
SELECT employee_id, attendance_date, hours_worked FROM employee_time_records WHERE hours_worked > 8;
SELECT employee_id, attendance_date, clock_in_time, clock_out_time FROM employee_time_records WHERE attendance_date = '2022-10-15';
SELECT * FROM employee_time_records ORDER BY employee_id ASC, attendance_date DESC;
SELECT employee_id, SUM(hours_worked) AS total_hours_worked FROM employee_time_records GROUP BY employee_id;
SELECT employee_id, attendance_date, hours_worked FROM employee_time_records WHERE employee_id = 101 ORDER BY attendance_date DESC
SELECT * FROM employee_time_records WHERE hours_worked > 8.0 AND attendance_date = '2022-05-20'
SELECT employee_id, clock_in_time, clock_out_time FROM employee_time_records WHERE employee_id IN (101, 102) ORDER BY clock_in_time
SELECT * FROM employee_time_records WHERE attendance_date BETWEEN '2022-05-01' AND '2022-05-31'
SELECT employee_id, SUM(hours_worked) AS total_hours_worked FROM employee_time_records GROUP BY employee_id HAVING total_hours_worked > 40
SELECT * FROM employee_records;
SELECT employee_id, employee_name FROM employee_records WHERE start_time < '2022-01-01';
SELECT employee_id, start_time, end_time FROM employee_records ORDER BY start_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM attendance_records WHERE is_late = TRUE;
SELECT employee_id, check_in_time, check_out_time FROM attendance_records ORDER BY check_in_time ASC;
SELECT employee_id, employee_name FROM employee_records WHERE employee_id = 1;
SELECT employee_name, start_time, end_time FROM employee_records ORDER BY start_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM attendance_records WHERE is_late = TRUE;
SELECT employee_id, check_in_time, check_out_time FROM attendance_records WHERE check_in_time < '2022-01-01';
SELECT employee_name, start_time, end_time, check_in_time FROM employee_records INNER JOIN attendance_records ON employee_records.employee_id = attendance_records.employee_id;
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT employee_name, hire_date FROM employees ORDER BY hire_date DESC;
SELECT employee_id, employee_email FROM employees WHERE department_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM labor_laws WHERE law_id = 1;
SELECT clock_in, clock_out FROM time_records WHERE employee_id = 101 ORDER BY clock_in ASC;
SELECT employee_id, employee_name, department_id FROM employees WHERE hire_date >= '2021-01-01' ORDER BY employee_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE department_id = 2 AND employee_name LIKE 'J%' AND hire_date < '2021-06-01';

SELECT e.employee_id, e.employee_name, t.clock_in, t.clock_out FROM employees e JOIN time_records t ON e.employee_id = t.employee_id WHERE t.clock_in BETWEEN '2021-01-01 08:00:00' AND '2021-01-01 17:00:00' ORDER BY t.clock_in;
SELECT l.law_id, l.law_name, COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM labor_laws l JOIN time_records t ON l.law_id = t.law_id GROUP BY l.law_id HAVING total_records > 5;
SELECT employee_id, MAX(hire_date) AS latest_hire_date FROM employees GROUP BY employee_id HAVING latest_hire_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Employee;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM Employee ORDER BY department ASC;
SELECT * FROM AttendanceRecord WHERE record_date = '2022-01-30';
SELECT employee_id, start_date FROM Employee WHERE department = 'HR';
SELECT * FROM OvertimeRecord ORDER BY overtime_hours DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM Employee;
SELECT employee_name, start_date, department FROM Employee WHERE department = 'IT';
SELECT employee_name, start_date, department FROM Employee ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT e.employee_name, a.record_date, a.clock_in_time, a.clock_out_time FROM Employee e INNER JOIN AttendanceRecord a ON e.employee_id = a.employee_id;
SELECT cr.report_id, cr.report_date, e.employee_name, cr.compliance_status FROM ComplianceReport cr LEFT JOIN Employee e ON cr.employee_id = e.employee_id ORDER BY cr.report_date;
SELECT * FROM time_attendance_records ORDER BY check_in DESC;
SELECT employee_id, firstname, department FROM employee_info WHERE department='HR';
SELECT * FROM compliance_records WHERE compliance_status='Pending';
SELECT employee_id, overtime_hours, overtime_date FROM overtime_records WHERE overtime_hours > 5;
SELECT department_name, manager_id FROM department_info ORDER BY department_name;
SELECT * FROM time_attendance_records WHERE employee_id = 123;
SELECT firstname, lastname FROM employee_info WHERE department = 'HR';
SELECT overtime_hours, overtime_date FROM overtime_records ORDER BY overtime_hours DESC;
SELECT department_name, manager_id FROM department_info WHERE department_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT record_date, compliance_status FROM compliance_records WHERE compliance_status = 'Pending' ORDER BY record_date;
